basic.description: The aim of the course is to help students strengthen some of the core competencies necessary for the practice of public health. Through a combination of workshops, seminars and online learning modules, students will gain skills for their practicum placement and for their ongoing work as a public health professional. This course is graded on a PASS/FAIL basis. 1.5 term hours per week, Fall and Winter terms, every year.
basic.subject: EPID
basic.title: Public Health Skills Workshops
